name: GGJ2018 - The Inteferece
description:
Play a DOOM-like game in a virtual PC with a twist -- the enemies' appearances are completely distorted. You have to tweak the twist to match the signal transmission from monster to visualize their weakpoint and make it killable!

Eventhough the game was designed for local multiplayer game, but it's still playable for one player, hope everyone enjoy it!

Controller - Screen Part:
WASD - Move
Left Ctrl - Shoot

Controller - Twist Part:
Mouse Click and Move vertically to rotate the twist.
